com.quorum.tessera.node

Interface PartyInfoService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PartyInfoServiceImpl

    public interface PartyInfoService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Party> findUnsavedParties(PartyInfo partyInfoWithUnsavedRecipients)
      Searches the provided PartyInfo for recipients that haven't yet been saved to the list of all known hosts
      PartyInfo getPartyInfo()
      Request PartyInfo data from all remote nodes that this node is aware of
      String getURLFromRecipientKey(Key key)
      Retrieves the URL that the node is located at for the given public key
      PartyInfo updatePartyInfo(PartyInfo partyInfo)
      Update the PartyInfo data store with the provided encoded data.

    • Method Detail

      • getPartyInfo

        PartyInfo getPartyInfo()
        Request PartyInfo data from all remote nodes that this node is aware of
        Returns:
        PartyInfo object

      • updatePartyInfo

        PartyInfo updatePartyInfo(PartyInfo partyInfo)
        Update the PartyInfo data store with the provided encoded data. This can happen when endpoint /partyinfo is triggered, or by a response from this node hitting another node /partyinfo endpoint
        Returns:
        updated PartyInfo object

      • getURLFromRecipientKey

        String getURLFromRecipientKey(Key key)
        Retrieves the URL that the node is located at for the given public key
        Parameters:
        key - the public key to search for
        Returns:
        the url the key's node is located at

      • findUnsavedParties

        Set<Party> findUnsavedParties(PartyInfo partyInfoWithUnsavedRecipients)
        Searches the provided PartyInfo for recipients that haven't yet been saved to the list of all known hosts
        Parameters:
        partyInfoWithUnsavedRecipients - received party info that should be diffed
        Returns:
        the list of all unknown recipients
